original_text: Then Amnon hated her exceedingly; so that the hatred wherewith he hated her was greater than the love wherewith he had loved her. And Amnon said unto her, Arise, be gone.
korean_text: 그리하고 암논이 그를 심히 미워하니 이제 미워하는 미움이 전에 사랑하던 사랑보다 더한지라 암논이 그에게 이르되 일어나 가라 하니

sentences.original_text: so that the hatred wherewith he hated her
was greater than love wherewith he had loved her
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그녀를 사랑하던 사랑보다 더 컸다
